cardData.title: Milk Mayhem
cardData.content: Dive into a chaotic maze adventure where you guide a fearless baby on a race against time to collect formula, dodge hazards, and reach the exit before the clock runs out!
cardData.description: A fast-paced maze game where you guide a baby to collect formula, avoid beer bottles, freeze time with clocks, and reach the exit within 60 seconds to advance or replay for a higher score.

cardData.title: Luxe
cardData.content: Luxe is a makeup product website with tutorials, offering a seamless shopping experience and admin-only product management, built with React, Next.js, and Material-UI.
cardData.description: This is a product website called Luxe that sells makeup and provides tutorials to help users create the best makeup looks tailored to their individual preferences. The platform is designed from a company's perspective where only administrators can add or remove products. It features a user-friendly shopping experience a library of tutorials for all skill levels and an admin dashboard for product management. Built with React, Next.js, and Material-UI it offers responsive design and seamless functionality.

cardData.title: Calendar
cardData.content: Calendar MJI is a school project where users can easily create, edit and delete to-dos within a simple and intuitive calendar interface.
cardData.description: Calendar MJI is a school project where we developed a calendar application that allows users to create, edit, and delete to-dos directly within the calendar interface. The goal was to build a simple and intuitive tool for managing daily tasks. The project focuses on core CRUD functionality and provides a clean, user-friendly design for efficient task planning.

cardData.title: Netflix
cardData.content: Netflix-2.0 is a Next.js and React-based streaming app clone that uses MongoDB to manage and display video content with a sleek, responsive interface.
cardData.description: This project is a replica of Netflix a popular streaming service. Built using Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Material-UI. It aims to mimic the user interface and functionality of Netflix, providing a familiar experience for users.

cardData.title: Boat
cardData.content: I have created a graphic profile and based on it created a wireframe and a mockup. In this task, I will implement everything in code. In this case html and css code.
cardData.description: My application is that I sell sailing trips around Europe. My made-up company is called Casperson boat, with the slogan it's a lifestyle.
